item.title: Good first issues
item.description: Flory, Justin W. This Mission is a guide to making "good first issues" (shortened to G.F.I.'s) for your Open Source community. To create good GFIs, we will explore these Objectives for this Mission: GFIs exist Assignee ratio Simple language Actionable Purpose Deadlines Low committment References 1. GFIs exist The first requirement to having good GFIs is toâ€¦ create GFIs!
